snippet.title: Waking Nightmare - A horror newtro FPS to the thrill of shooting - simple, intuitive, and engaging.
snippet.description:
Presently at the prototype phase, our project lays the groundwork to test and refine the envisioned gameplay balance. We're eager to gather feedback on its potential and identify opportunities for improvement, paving the way for a development phase that aims to finely blend retro appeal with modern sensibilities.

#NewtroFPS #singleplayer #Indie
